analysis.key_quote: Our federal workers should be non partisan working to uphold the constitution, serving the prople, carrying out programs congress has created, not puppets of any political actor, not ‘yes’ people to sny politician.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reclassification of federal workers, emphasizing the importance of nonpartisan service and constitutional loyalty, which aligns with concerns about politicization of the civil service.
